backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining profile, like, match, and chat types with comparison functions and CRUD logic using access control, blob storage, and in‑memory maps/sets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI filter update to affected frontend files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the app to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, manifest links, and loading the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, orientation, and icon assets for PlayPal.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned caching with precache, network-first for APIs, and cache-first for static assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that routes between login, profile setup, and the authenticated app shell based on identity and profile state.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Manages navigation between main app screens, handling chat and match profile transitions with unread message logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessageBubbl: Displays a chat message bubble with styling based on sender and formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Renders a profile card with photo, stats, availability, and visual details for the Discover screen.
Provides level and zone filter controls for the Discover screen using select inputs.
frontend/src/components/LevelStars.tsx: Shows a 1–5 star rating based on player level.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles image selection and upload with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user's avatar image or a fallback icon if no image exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageNotificatio: Hook that polls for new chat messages, tracks unread counts per sender, and syncs unread state with localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profile management, discovery, chat, and media upload using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors and global element defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and renders the root application.
frontend/src/screens/ChatScreen.tsx: Chat UI displaying messages with a recipient, message sending logic, and profile header details.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: Swipe-style discovery screen that filters candidates and allows liking or passing users.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form screen for editing a user profile with fields for name, age, level, position, zone, availability, and bio.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, feature highlights, and buttons for logging in or creating an account using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/screens/MatchesScreen.tsx: Shows a list of matches for the logged-in user and loads each matched user's profile with actions to chat or view profile.
Displays another user's profile with loading and error states, showing avatar, level, position, and other details with back navigation.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Displays the logged-in user's profile with editing support, avatar management, stats, and personal details.
Provides a form for new users to enter profile details and submit them to create their account.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Shows settings including logout functionality and basic app information.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Utility mappings for converting level and position enums to numbers and Spanish labels.
frontend/src/utils/unreadMessagesStore.t: Manages unread message state per user by loading, saving, and clearing data from localStorage. Tracks timestamps, unique message keys, and unread counts by sender.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the hash. Supports both query-based and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and new requests, including a pending request to use Uruguay department dropdowns in filters.
